Swampy Boyz (Age of Sigmar) [1,975pts]

  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Destruction - Orruk Warclans) [1,975pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Command Entourage

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Artefacts of Power, Magnificent

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Command Entourage


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Command Entourage 1 Commander
        2-3 Sub-commanders

      • Orruk Warclans Core Battalion: Kruleboyz Finga

        Categories: Core Battalion, Battalion, Orruk Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Kruleboyz Finga


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required
        Core Battalion: Kruleboyz Finga 1 KRULEBOYZ Sub-commander
        2-3 KRULEBOYZ Troops
        0-1 HOBGROT SLITTAZ unit

    • Leader [935pts]

      • Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork [300pts]

        Selections: Back-up Stabba, Beak and Flesh-tearing Talons, Bogbark Staff, Stinger, Vulcha Damage Table

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, ORRUK WARCLANS, ORRUK, KRULEBOYZ, HERO, MONSTER, TOTEM, WIZARD, CORPSE-RIPPA VULCHA, SWAMPCALLA SHAMAN, GOBSPRAKK, Unique, Leader, Behemoth

        Magic: Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Choking Mist, Da Black Pit, Mystic Shield, Nasty Hex, Sneaky Miasma, Summon Boggy Mist, Unit: Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork, Unit Abilities: Fly, Glyphic Banners, Mork Sez No!, Mouth of Mork, Screamin' Mandrakk, Vulcha Wounds: 00-05, 06-08, 09-11, 12+, Weapon: Back-up Stabba, Beak and Flesh-tearing Talons, Bogbark Staff, Stinger


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Summon Boggy Mist.
        All spells from Lore of the Swamp.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Choking Mist 724"If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within range and visible to the caster. All units within 6" of that point are affected by choking mist until the start of your next hero phase. While a unit is affected by choking mist, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by it (to a minimum of 1), and it cannot run.
        Da Black Pit 712"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. Roll a dice for each model in that unit. For each 6, and for each other roll that is equal to or greater than that unit's Save characteristic, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Nasty Hex 712"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. Until the end of your turn, ward rolls cannot be made for models in that unit.
        Sneaky Miasma 618"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly KRULEBOYZ MONSTER within range and visible to the caster. That MONSTER can make a normal move.
        Summon Boggy Mist 7-If successfully cast, until your next hero phase, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly KRULEBOYZ ORRUK units on the battlefield and subtract 1 from charge rolls for other units on the battlefield.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork *1465+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Glyphic Banners This model has a word of 6+.
        Mork Sez No! Each time this unit unbinds a spell, the caster suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the spell was unbound with an unbinding roll of 10+, the caster suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Mouth of Mork If this unit issues the Redeploy command to a KRULEBOYZ unit, you can re-roll the dice that determines the distance the unit that receives the command can move.

        If this unit issues the Unleash Hell command to a KRULEBOYZ unit, you do not have to subtract 1 from the hit rolls for the attacks made by the unit that receives the command.
        Screamin' Mandrakk Once per battle, when this unit attempts to unbind a spell, you can say that it is using its Screamin' Mandrakk. If you do so, the unbinding roll for that attempt is made with 3D6 instead of 2D6.
        Vulcha Wounds MoveBeak and Flesh-tearing TalonsStinger

        09-11 10"34+
        12+ 8"25+

      • Killaboss with Stab-grot [110pts]

        Selections: Boss-hacka, Kruleboyz Finga - 1 Sub-commander, Prized Shiv, Skareshield

        Categories: Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader, ORRUK, KRULEBOYZ, HERO, DESTRUCTION, ORRUK WARCLANS, KILLABOSS, KILLABOSS WITH STAB-GROT, SKARESHIELD

        Unit: Killaboss With Stab-Grot, Unit Abilities: All Part of Da Plan, Companion, You Hold 'Em Off, Weapon: Boss-hacka, Prized Shiv

        • Arcane Tome

          Selections: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield

          Categories: Artefact

          Artefact: Arcane Tome, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Arcane Tome The bearer becomes a WIZARD that knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. If the bearer is already a Wizard, they can attempt to cast 1 additional spell instead.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Killaboss With Stab-Grot 5674+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        All Part of Da Plan If a friendly KRULEBOYZ unit fails a battleshock test within 3" of any friendly units with this ability, only 1 model from that unit will flee.
        Companion This Killaboss is accompanied by a Stab-grot that attacks with its Prized Shiv. The Stab-grot must remain within 1" of the Killaboss. For rules purposes, the Killaboss and Stab-grot are treated as a single model.
        You Hold 'Em Off Each time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to this unit and not negated, you can choose to risk this unit's Stab-grot. If you do so, you must roll a dice. On a 1-5, the Stab-grot is killed and the wound is negated. On a 6, the Stab-grot is not killed and the wound is negated. If the Stab-grot is killed, the model representing it is removed from play before the wound is negated.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Boss-hacka Melee1"43+3+-12
        Prized Shiv Melee1"34+4+-1

      • Snatchaboss on Sludgeraker Beast [315pts]

        Selections: Amulet of Destiny, Command Entourage - 1 Commander, Damage Table, Egomaniak, General, Grasping Talons, Loud 'Un, Noisome Bite, Thrashing Tail

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, ORRUK WARCLANS, ORRUK, SLUDGERAKER BEAST, KRULEBOYZ, HERO, MONSTER, SNATCHABOSS, Leader, Behemoth, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Command Trait: Egomaniak, Mount Trait: Loud 'Un, Sludgeraker Wounds: 00-05, 06-08, 09-11, 12+, Unit: Snatchaboss on Sludgeraker Beast, Unit Abilities: Sludgeraker Venom, Snatch and Grab, Weapon: Grasping Talons, Noisome Bite, Thrashing Tail


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details
        Egomaniak If this general is within 3" of another friendly unit, roll a dice before you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this general or instead of making a ward roll for this general. On a 4+, pick 1 other friendly unit within 3" of this general. That wound is allocated to that unit instead and cannot be negated.
        Mount Trait Mount Trait Details
        Loud 'Un MONSTER only. When you carry out the Roar monstrous rampage with this model, pick all enemy units within 3" of this model instead of 1.
        Sludgeraker Wounds Grasping TalonsNoisome BiteThrashing Tail
        00-05 6D3+32+
        06-08 5D3+23+
        09-11 4D3+14+
        12+ 3D35+
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Snatchaboss on Sludgeraker Beast 8"1464+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Sludgeraker Venom Add 1 to the number of mortal wounds casued by the Venom-encrusted Weapons battle trait if the unmodified hit roll was 6 and the attacking unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly units with this ability.
        Snatch and Grab Once per battle, at the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model that has a Wounds characteristic of 7 or less, does not have a mount and is within 3" of this unit, and roll 2D6. If the roll is greater than that enemy model's Wounds characteristic, it is slain.

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Swampcalla Shaman and Pot-grot 5"665+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Companion This Swampcalla Shaman is accompanied by a Pot-grot that attacks with its Back-up Stabba. The Pot-grot must remain within 1" of the Swampcalla Shaman. For rules purposes, the Swampcalla Shaman and Pot-grot are treated as a single model.
        Poisons and Elixirs In your hero phase, if this unit is more than 3" from all enemy units, instead of attempting to cast any spells with this unit, you can say that they are brewing either a poison or an elixir. If you do so, pick 1 friendly KRULEBOYZ ORRUK unit wholly within 12" of this unit, more than 3" from all enemy units and that has at least 1 model within 3" of this unit to be given that poison or elixir. A unit that has been given a poison or elixir cannot be given another poison or elixir in the same hero phase.

        In your hero phase, if this unit is more than 3" from all enemy units, instead of attempting to cast any spells with this unit, you can say that they are brewing either a poison or an elixir. If you do so, pick 1 friendly KRULEBOYZ ORRUK unit wholly within 12" of this unit, more than 3" from all enemy units and that has at least 1 model within 3" of this unit to be given that poison or elixir. A unit that has been given a poison or elixir cannot be given another poison or elixir in the same hero phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Back-up Stabba Melee1"24+4+-1

    • Battleline [540pts]

      • Gutrippaz [180pts]

        Selections: 10 Gutrippaz [180pts], Kruleboyz Finga - 2-3 Troops, Musician, Standard Bearer, Wicked Stikka

        Categories: Battleline, KRULEBOYZ, ORRUK, DESTRUCTION, ORRUK WARCLANS, GUTRIPPAZ

        Unit: Gutrippaz, Unit Abilities: Gutrippa Banner Bearer, Gutrippa Boss, Musician, Scare Taktikz, Weapon: Wicked Stikka


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Gutrippaz 5"255+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Gutrippa Banner Bearer 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Gutrippa Banner Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that includes any Gutrippa Banner Bearers.
        Gutrippa Boss 1 model in this unit can be an Gutrippa Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Wicked Stikka.
        Musician 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Gutrippa Drummer or Gutrippa Hornblower. You can add 1 to charge rolls for a unit that includes any Gutrippa Drummers or Gutrippa Hornblowers.
        Scare Taktikz At the start of the charge phase, if this unit is more than 3" from all enemy units, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this unit that is not a HERO or MONSTER and roll 2D6. Add 1 to the roll for every 5 models in this unit. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Bravery characteristic of that enemy unit, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that enemy unit that target this unit until the end of that turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Wicked Stikka Melee2"24+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Orruk Warclans

          • Big Waaagh!

            Battle Trait: Venom-encrusted Weapons, Warpaint, Command Abilities: Mighty Destroyer

            • The Power of the Big Waaagh!

              Selections: Waaagh! Points, Waaagh! Power

              Power of the Waaagh! Points: A) D6 pts, B) 2 pts, C) 1 pt, D) 1 pt, E) 1 pt, Waaagh! Power: 08, 10, 12, 16, 20, 24


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Venom-encrusted Weapons If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by a KRULEBOYZ ORRUK model is 6, that attack causes a number of mortal wounds to the target equal to the weapon's Damage characteristic and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll). This ability has no effect on attacks made by a mount.
        Warpaint Friendly BONESPLITTERZ units have a ward of 6+.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Mighty Destroyer You can use this command ability in your hero phase. The model that issues the command must be an IRONJAWZ model and the unit that receives the command must be an IRONJAWZ unit.

        - If the unit that received the command is more than 12" from all enemy units, you must make a normal move with the unit.

        - If the unit that received the command is within 3" of an enemy unit, you must make a pile-in move with each model in the unit.

        - If the unit is within 12" of an enemy unit and more than 3" from all enemy units, you must attempt a charge with the unit.
        Power of the Waaagh! Points Description
        A) D6 pts At the start of your hero phase, if your general is on the battlefield.
        B) 2 pts At the start of your hero phase, if there are any friendly WARCHANTERS on the battlefield.
        C) 1 pt At the start of your hero phase, if there are any friendly BONESPLITTERZ WIZARDS on the battlefield.
        D) 1 pt In your charge phase, for each friendly ORRUK unit that finishes a charge move.
        E) 1 pt At the end of the combat phase, for each friendly ORRUK unit that is within 3" of an enemy unit.
        Waaagh! Power Waaagh! Power
        08 Zog 'Em: You can add 1 to run for friendly ORRUKS units.
        10 Get 'Em: Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly ORRUK units.
        12 Zap 'Em: Add 1 to casting, displelling and unbinding rolls for friendly ORRUK WIZARDS.
        16 Smash 'Em: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly ORRUK units.
        20 Bash 'Em: Add 1 to wounds rolls for attacks made with melee weapons used by friendly ORRUK units.
        24 WAAAGH!: At the start of the combat phase, you can say you will release the power of the Waaagh!. If you do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ORRUK units for the rest of that phase. At the end of the phase, you lose all Waaagh! points you have received so far, and your army loses all the Waaagh! powers it has gained so far.

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Vendetta

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Vendetta


        Grand Strategy Description
        Vendetta When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if the model chosen to be your opponent's general has been slain and the model chosen to be your general has not been slain.
